title: Handle Player Trade Request
description: A star player has requested a trade. The General Manager needs to find a suitable trade partner.

tasks.description: Identify teams that have a need for the player's position and have sufficient salary cap space.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of five potential trade partner teams.

tasks.description: Analyze the rosters of the potential partner teams to identify players they might be willing to trade in return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of potential target players from each of the five teams.

tasks.description: Construct several hypothetical trade packages and present them to the General Manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes three different trade scenarios for the GM to consider.
